snippet: Puncturing days of feverish anticipation, marathon talks were stymied not only by divisions between Iran and major powers, but also by fissures within the group negotiating with Iran.
abstract: Marathon talks between major powers and Iran fail to produce a deal to freeze its nuclear program, puncturing days of feverish anticipation and underscoring how hard it will be to forge a lasting solution to Iran's nuclear ambitions; it is not only division between Iran and the major powers that prevents a deal, but fissures within the negotiating group as well.

byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and MICHAEL R. GORDON
byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem, and David E. Sanger from Denver.

lead_paragraph: Puncturing days of feverish anticipation, marathon talks were stymied not only by divisions between Iran and major powers, but also by fissures within the group negotiating with Iran.

headline.main: Talks With Iran Fail to Produce a Nuclear Agreement
headline.print_headline: Talks With Iran Fail to Produce a Nuclear Pact
